description: Episode of Series "Building Political Leadership". According to Dr. Ivan Hinderaker, the founders of the United States of America questioned whether they should control it. He explains how the American Constitution and the Bill of Rights came about, and claim that there are three main classifications of government: Dictatorship or Democracy? Unitary or Federal? Parliamentary or Presidential? Good use of graphics as an educational tool.
